issue.title: Error [ERR_IPC_CHANNEL_CLOSED]: Channel closed at ChildProcess.target.send (internal/child_process.js:679:16)
issue.body:

    at ChildProcess.target.send (internal/child_process.js:679:16)

Hello @htt828. Please provide a reproducible example following the [instruction](https://github.com/eggjs/egg/issues/3310).

Issues labeled by `Need Reproduce` will be closed if no activities in 7 days.

---

@htt828，请根据[这个说明](https://github.com/eggjs/egg/issues/3310)提供最小可复现代码。

如果在 7 天内没有进展会被自动关闭。
